comments:
when a view provides a custom PropertySheetPage (PSP) by overriding the getAdapter() metod, this leads to the exception shown below in certain cirumstances. My investigations have shown the following:

- let V be a view that provides a custom PSP. Let the PropertiesView (PV) be visible. Make an initial selection in V that causes PV to display the properties. Now activate some other view V2.

- now reactivate PV

- now select an element in V. The part activation event is caught by PV. PV then gets the PSP, and since it is different from the current PSP, it calls the PageBook.showPage() method on it, which causes activation of the PV. This leads to the recursion error since it happens while V is still being activated.

=== stack trace:
